# <a name="how-to-attach-files-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="2364e-102">如何在網頁上的 Outlook 中附加檔案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2364e-102">How to attach files in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="2364e-103">在郵件或行事曆事件的底部，選取曲別針圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2364e-103">At the bottom of a message or calendar event, select the paperclip icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="2364e-104">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2364e-104">.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2364e-105">選取 **[流覽此電腦]** ，以在您的電腦上附加檔案，或 **流覽雲端位置** 以附加線上檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2364e-105">Select **Browse this computer** to attach a file on your computer or **Browse cloud locations** to attach an online file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2364e-106">若要深入瞭解，請參閱 [在 Outlook 網頁版中附加](https://support.office.com/article/48b8dca1-7a76-43ce-97d1-e1cf73893f55)檔案。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2364e-106">To learn more, see [Attach files in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/48b8dca1-7a76-43ce-97d1-e1cf73893f55).</span></span>
